HomePage.title: Kartpetania - The Ultimate Karting Experience
HomePage.subtitle: Professional karting circuit with 980m of pure adrenaline in Segovia.
HomePage.facilities: We have a large cafeteria with meeting rooms and wonderful natural terraces with unbeatable views of the mountains.
HomePage.training: Our facilities serve as training for both amateur and professional racers in any discipline of karting and motorcycling.
HomePage.rental: We also have a large fleet of RENTAL KARTS, to delight both the little ones and the adults.
HomePage.events: There is also the possibility of renting the entire venue (5 hectares) exclusively.
HomePage.dining: MEALS ARRANGED ON REQUEST. Paellas, Barbecues, Roasts, Burgers, sandwiches... etc

KartsPage.title: Kart Rental Fleet
KartsPage.subtitle: Choose the perfect kart for your age and skill level.
KartsPage.kidsDesc: Perfect for children to learn safely. Controlled speed and maximum safety.
KartsPage.biplazaDesc: Accompanied by an adult. Ideal for the first experience.
KartsPage.juniorDesc: For children who can drive alone. Controlled speed.
KartsPage.adults270Desc: Honda 4-stroke engine. Ideal for beginners and intermediate drivers (12+ years).
KartsPage.adults390Desc: High performance for experienced drivers. Adrenaline guaranteed.
KartsPage.safetyDesc: Before starting any session, our monitors will explain the rules and correct driving techniques.
KartsPage.cancellationPolicy: CANCELLATION POLICY: The reservation amount will not be refunded unless rain or snow on the day of the activity.
KartsPage.rule1: Use of helmet (and hygienic balaclava) is mandatory.
KartsPage.rule2: No loose clothing (scarves) or open shoes (flip-flops) allowed.
KartsPage.rule4: Deliberate contact between karts is prohibited.
KartsPage.390ccDesc: This rental kart model incorporates a 390cc HONDA 4-stroke engine, capable of reaching 90km/h.
KartsPage.usedForChampionships: Used for official championships and events
KartsPage.experienceRequiredNote: You must have previously demonstrated experience in 270cc karts before renting this model
KartsPage.cancellationText1: Once the date and time have been agreed upon and payment made, the amount will not be refunded if cancelled.
KartsPage.cancellationArrival: Arrive 1/2 hour before the reservation time at the cafeteria.
KartsPage.cancellationRefund: The booking fee will only be refunded in the event of rain or snow on the day and at the time of the activity.
KartsPage.rulesImportantNote: Book in advance to secure your spot, or call ahead to check availability.
KartsPage.rulesIntro: Before each session, our staff will provide a safety briefing covering proper kart operation and facility guidelines.
KartsPage.ruleNeckItems: Loose items around the neck (scarves, necklaces, lanyards) are strictly prohibited.
KartsPage.ruleFollowInstructions: All drivers must follow staff instructions at all times while on circuit grounds.
KartsPage.ruleContract: Signing the waiver does not authorize reckless or dangerous driving.
KartsPage.ruleLeaveTrack: Staff reserve the right to remove any driver who endangers themselves or others.
KartsPage.ruleProhibitStart: Drivers showing signs of intoxication will not be permitted on the track.
KartsPage.ruleHelmetRequired: Helmet and hygienic balaclava must be worn at all times on track.
KartsPage.ruleWinterClothing: In winter, warm clothing is recommended. Gloves available at the circuit.
KartsPage.ruleNoSmoking: Smoking is prohibited in the pit lane and track areas.
KartsPage.ruleInsurance: All drivers are covered by civil liability and accident insurance.

RatesPage.title: Own Vehicle Rates
RatesPage.subtitle: Another way to enjoy Kartpetania is with your own vehicle.
RatesPage.introText: Below we detail the different types of vehicles that can race at Kartpetania:
RatesPage.bikesTypes: MINIMOTOS • MINIMOTARD • PIT BIKE • SCOOTER • SUPERMOTARD... Etc.
RatesPage.carsNote: Only allowed for scheduled events or courses. Please inquire about pricing.
RatesPage.hoursNote: You will be able to drive during the hours indicated by the circuit.
RatesPage.availabilityNote: It's always best to call to check availability. It's not possible every day.
RatesPage.insuranceDesc: Sports accident insurance is mandatory to use the track with your own vehicle. If you don't have it, you can purchase it at the circuit. We offer annual insurance policies valid for any circuit nationwide.
RatesPage.trackAccessStep1: Purchase a ticket/sticker at the cafeteria
RatesPage.trackAccessStep2: Present proof of valid accident insurance
RatesPage.trackAccessStep3: The ticket/sticker will be affixed to your vehicle
RatesPage.trackAccessStep4: You will be granted access when indicated by circuit staff
RatesPage.followStaffNote: You must follow the instructions of the track staff at all times. If you have any questions, consult them.
RatesPage.priceVariation: Ticket/sticker prices may vary depending on the type of event; it is advisable to check beforehand.
RatesPage.electricWarning: ELECTRIC VEHICLES WILL NOT BE ALLOWED TO RIDE WITHOUT CARRYING A SPECIAL 5kg CO2 FIRE EXTINGUISHER.
RatesPage.annualDesc: An annual membership card entitling you to use the track during posted hours and store your kart or motorcycle at the circuit for one year.
RatesPage.semiAnnualDesc: A six-month membership card entitling you to use the track during posted hours and store your kart or motorcycle at the circuit for six months.
RatesPage.trackOnlyAnnualDesc: An annual membership card entitling you to use the track at the times indicated on the calendar.
RatesPage.trackOnlySemiDesc: A six-month membership card entitling you to use the track at the times indicated on the calendar.
